solution_line_template: Casey can hula hoop {casey_less_than_nancy} minutes less than Nancy so she can hula hoop for {nancy_time}-{casey_less_than_nancy} = <<{nancy_time}-{casey_less_than_nancy}={casey_time}>>{casey_time} minutes

Morgan can hula hoop three times as long as Casey, who can hula hoop for {casey_time} minutes, so she can hula hoop for {morgan_multiplier}*{casey_time} = <<{morgan_multiplier}*{casey_time}={morgan_time}>>{morgan_time} minutes
